mapper.select: SELECT ft.tx_id, ft.ref_type, ft.ref_id, ft.patient_id, ft.admin_id, ft.type, ft.category, ft.amount, ft.description, ft.status, ft.created_at, ft.updated_at, p.order_id, p.payment_key, p.status AS paymentStatus, rr.status AS refund_status FROM finance_transaction ft JOIN ( SELECT ref_id, MAX(tx_id) AS max_tx_id FROM finance_transaction WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} AND status = 'COMPLETED' AND type = 'INCOME' GROUP BY ref_id ) recent ON ft.ref_id = recent.ref_id AND ft.tx_id = recent.max_tx_id LEFT JOIN payment p ON ft.ref_id = p.payment_id AND ft.ref_type = 'PAYMENT' LEFT JOIN refund_request rr ON p.order_id = rr.order_id ORDER BY ft.created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM finance_transaction WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} AND status = 'PENDING' AND type = 'INCOME' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM finance_transaction WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} AND status = 'PENDING' AND type = 'INCOME'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (patient_id, amount, order_id, status) VALUES (#{patientId}, #{amount}, #{orderId}, 'REQUESTED')
mapper.select: SELECT payment_id, patient_id, amount, order_id, payment_key, pg_provider, status, created_at, updated_at FROM payment WHERE order_id = #{orderId} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET status = 'SUCCESS', payment_key = #{paymentKey}, pg_provider = #{pgProvider}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
